Name: LiveOnIdol
About the game: Live On Idol Become an idol photographer Let's complete the idol photo album Live On Idol!! Live On Idol is a VR game. I actually became a photographer using a VR device, so I put a VR controller (camera) on my right hand. Left hand and move the position to controllers vr and model photography and games are played. Each place (stage) has four good photo collection missions, and if you collect all four good photos, You can move on to the next mission. If you clear these four missions, you'll go to the next stage. A total of 4 stages are Level 1 and run until Level4. For each level of each stage, the costume is assigned as a challenge, and you can change the costume by clearing the level. As the level progresses, the camera can zoom in closer. Complete the photo book LiveOnIdol by collecting Good Photo. You can enjoy the pictures collected by the players in the main lobby, and each picture is stored in the game folder so you can watch them anytime The protagonist Jenny and his photographer Based on various places and special concepts Make memories and travel with idol'Jenny' Ecstatic magic game together!! ※ In Options, select the Graphic high option to play in a better environment. To view saved photos, see C:\Users\OOO\AppData\Local\VRProject\Saved Find it. ※
